SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class MetricsEndpoint

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.MetricsEndpoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
RobinMetricsEndpoint
public class MetricsEndpoint extends Object
Monitoring and management endpoint.

This class sets up an embedded HTTP server to expose various application metrics and operational endpoints.

It provides metrics in Prometheus and Graphite formats, along with a simple web UI for visualization.

Additionally, it offers endpoints for health checks, environment variables, system properties, thread dumps, and heap dumps.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(int metricsPort) throws IOException
      Starts the embedded HTTP server for the metrics and management endpoint.

      This method initializes metric registries, binds JVM metrics, creates HTTP contexts for all endpoints, and sets up shutdown hooks for graceful termination.

      Parameters:
      metricsPort - The port on which the HTTP server will listen for incoming requests.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during server startup.

    • start

      public void start(int metricsPort, String username, String password) throws IOException
      Starts the embedded HTTP server for the metrics and management endpoint with authentication.

      This method initializes metric registries, binds JVM metrics, creates HTTP contexts for all endpoints, and sets up shutdown hooks for graceful termination.

      Parameters:
      metricsPort - The port on which the HTTP server will listen for incoming requests.
      username - The username for HTTP Basic Authentication (null to disable authentication).
      password - The password for HTTP Basic Authentication.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during server startup.

    • bindJvmMetrics

      private void bindJvmMetrics()
      Binds standard JVM metrics to the Prometheus and Graphite registries.

      This includes memory usage, garbage collection, thread metrics, and processor metrics.

    • createContexts

      protected void createContexts()
      Creates and registers HTTP context handlers for all supported endpoints.

      Provides a JSON response with the status and uptime.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      Throws:

    • shutdownHooks

      private void shutdownHooks()
      Registers shutdown hooks to gracefully close resources.

      This ensures the HTTP server and metric registries are closed when the JVM terminates.

    • getGraphiteMeterRegistry

      @NotNull private io.micrometer.graphite.GraphiteMeterRegistry getGraphiteMeterRegistry()
      Configures and creates a GraphiteMeterRegistry.
      Returns:
      A configured GraphiteMeterRegistry instance.
